metadata.title: CVE-2024-0562 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux Kernel. When a disk isremoved, bdi_unregister is called to stop further write-back and waits forassociated delayed work to complete. However, wb_inode_writeback_end() mayschedule bandwidth estimation work after this has completed, which canresult in the timer attempting to access the recently freed bdi_writeback.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0562` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
